'''25w21a''' is the seventh and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.6]], released on May 20, 2025.<ref>{{snap|25w21a|id=a|May 20, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Added <code>entity/leashknot/break</code> for when a [[lead]] snaps.
* The following sounds have been added for [[shear]]ing [[saddle]]s, [[horse armor]], and [[carpet]]s from [[llama]]s.
** <code>mob/horse/armor_unequip</code>
** <code>mob/horse/saddle_unequip</code>
** <code>mob/llama/unequip</code>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Horse]], [[donkey]], and [[mule]]'''
* Can now be fed [[carrot]]s to heal, grow, and improve their temper, with the same effect as [[apple]]s.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* The following sounds have been renamed:
** <code>entity/leashknot/break1</code> -> <code>entity/leashknot/unleash1</code>
** <code>entity/leashknot/break2</code> -> <code>entity/leashknot/unleash2</code>
** <code>entity/leashknot/break3</code> -> <code>entity/leashknot/unleash3</code>
** <code>entity/leashknot/place1</code> -> <code>entity/leashknot/leash1</code>
** <code>entity/leashknot/place2</code> -> <code>entity/leashknot/leash2</code>
** <code>entity/leashknot/place3</code> -> <code>entity/leashknot/leash3</code>

=== General ===
'''[[Clouds]]'''
* The pattern of clouds has been changed.

'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|78}}.

'''[[Dialog]]s'''
* {{cd|run_command}} click actions will now correctly close dialogs and book screens even if the command does not require elevated permissions.
* Dialogs should now correctly return to the previous non-dialog screen on close in all cases.
* If a new dialog is received by the client while warning screen is visible, it will not replace it, but when user clicks the "Back" button, the new dialog will be restored instead.
* The sizes of elements in dialogs are now restricted:
** buttons - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|1024}} (inclusive).
** {{cd|minecraft:plain_message}} dialog body - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|1024}} (inclusive).
** {{cd|minecraft:item}} dialog body
*** {{cd|width}} of {{cd|description}} - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|1024}} (inclusive).
*** {{cd|width}} - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|256}} (inclusive).
*** {{cd|height}} - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|256}} (inclusive).
** {{cd|minecraft:text}} input control - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|1024}} (inclusive).
** {{cd|minecraft:single_option}} input control - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|1024}} (inclusive).
** {{cd|minecraft:number_range}} input control - between {{cd|1}} and {{cd|1024}} (inclusive).
* {{cd|minecraft:text}} input control
** {{cd|max_length}} - maximum length of input, positive integer with default of {{cd|32}}.
** {{cd|multiline}} - if present, allows users to input multiple lines, optional object with fields:
*** {{cd|max_lines}} - if present, limits maximum lines, optional positive integer.
*** {{cd|height}} - height of input, optional integer in range {{cd|1}} to {{cd|512}}.
**** If this field is omitted, but {{cd|max_lines}} is present, the height will be chosen to fit the maximum number of lines.
**** If this and {{cd|max_lines}} are both omitted, it will default to a height that fits 4 lines.
* {{cd|minecraft:number_range}} input control
** The {{cd|steps}} field has been replaced with a new field:
*** {{cd|step}} - step size, optional positive float.
**** If present, only values of {{cd|initial + <any integer> * step}} will be allowed.
**** If absent, any value from range the is allowed.
** {{cd|initial}} - if not specified, now defaults to the middle of the range.
* {{cd|minecraft:multi_action_input_form}} dialog type.
** Added new field {{cd|columns}} - positive integer describing number of columns, default: {{cd|2}}.

'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The version is now {{cd|62}}.

'''[[Tags]]'''
* Added {{cd|carrot}} to {{cd|#horse_food}} item tag.
